column5:
Merge pull request #64 from fphilipe/improve-accessibility

Improve accessibility

Closes #36, #41, #63

Use UIView instead of UIButton for container

This fixes accessibility issues and improves testability.

Remove Gemfile{,.lock}

No need to manage cocoapods installation in the repo.

Merge pull request #31 from slycrel/master

Added storyboard / xib support.

Closes #30

Thanks @slycrel
Animate when pressing send in example app
Expose animated version of setting the text
Remove scrolling to bottom in example app
Adjust text view position and behavior
Manual scrolling is no longer needed

Adjust size and position of line and toolbar

UIToolbar seems not to respect the height resize option. Thus, it needs
to be done by hand.

The line is initially placed at a half point from the top. When the
super view height changes, the line is placed on an integer point. Thus,
the line is placed at a half point when laying out the subviews.
Use custom button subclass for both buttons
Increase the height of compose bar view

Improve scroll view in demo

- fix positioning
- add chat bubbles to get an idea of the blur effect
Use white background in the demo

Replace background image with UIToolbar

UIToolbar is used to achieve the translucent effect.
Use bundler to fix dependency mismatch

Merge pull request #15 from bitdeli-chef/master

Add a Bitdeli Badge to README
Add a Bitdeli badge to README

Expose buttons

This is done for users that might want to further customize the behavior
of the control.

Closes #7
Include documentation about new delegate methods
Use frame delegate methods in example

Add delegate methods for frame changes

Closes #1

Replace textBar occurences with composeBar

This project was extracted from another project where it was called text
bar and not compose bar.

Use UI_APPEARANCE_SELECTOR

This is used for buttonTintColor, buttonTitle, placeholder, and
utilityButtonImage.
Use weak instead of assign for delegate

Fix bug where view would get messed up

This would happen when the utility button image was set multiple times
in a row to either an image or nil.

Make text view uneditable when disabled

This fixes a bug where the text view was still editable when disabling
the view.
Use x and width of button for char count label
Add ability to change button tint color
Make it more similar to iMessage
Minor code tweaks to improve readability
Calculate run time constants once only
Use proper height when initializing view
Add more comments to header file
